verses.name: 1 Kings 8:56
verses.text: Blessed be the Lord, that hath given rest unto his people Israel, according to all that he promised: there hath not failed one word of all his good promise, which he promised by the hand of Moses his servant.

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:57
verses.text: The Lord our God be with us, as he was with our fathers: let him not leave us, nor forsake us:

verses.name: 1 Kings 8:58
verses.text: That he may incline our hearts unto him, to walk in all his ways, and to keep his commandments, and his statutes, and his judgments, which he commanded our fathers.
